title: Gibson Official Website: Iconic Guitars, Instruments and Gear
title_zh: Gibson 官网：经典吉他、乐器与装备
summary_en: The official website of Gibson Brands, Inc., a legendary American manufacturer of premium acoustic and electric guitars, including the iconic Les Paul series. The site offers product browsing, online purchasing, artist spotlights, brand history, and support resources for musicians worldwide.
summary_zh: Gibson Brands, Inc. 是美国传奇高端原声吉他和电吉他（包括经典的 Les Paul 系列）制造商的官方网站。该网站提供产品浏览、在线购买、艺术家专访、品牌历史以及为全球音乐家提供的支持资源。
best_quote_en: Gibson has been shaping sound across generations and genres of music, becoming a global icon of music culture and continuing to inspire musical creativity.
best_quote_zh: Gibson 一直在塑造跨越几代人和多种音乐流派的声音，成为全球音乐文化的标志，并持续激发音乐创造力。

title: Fender International: Official Online Store for Guitars, Basses, and Amplifiers
title_zh: Fender国际站：吉他、贝斯和放大器的官方在线商店
summary_en: The official international online store of Fender, a world-renowned musical instrument brand. The website offers a wide range of electric guitars, acoustic guitars, basses, amplifiers, effectors, and accessories. It also provides detailed product information, artist profiles, learning resources, and support services, catering to musicians from beginners to professionals.
summary_zh: Fender是世界知名乐器品牌的官方国际在线商店。网站提供各种电吉他、原声吉他、贝斯、放大器、效果器和配件，并提供详细的产品信息、艺术家资料、学习资源和支持服务，满足从初学者到专业音乐家的需求。
best_quote_en: Fender has become a globally iconic music culture symbol, inspiring musical creativity and accompanying musicians at every stage of their musical journey.
best_quote_zh: Finder已成为全球标志性的音乐文化符号，不断激发音乐创造力，陪伴音乐人每段音乐旅程的各个舞台。

title: Russian for Free: Learn Russian online for free with interactive lessons
title_zh: 免费俄语学习：通过互动课程免费在线学习俄语
summary_en: A comprehensive free online resource for learning Russian, offering interactive lessons, grammar exercises, vocabulary building, and audio materials. The website provides structured courses from beginner to intermediate levels with practical examples and cultural insights.
summary_zh: 一个全面的免费在线俄语学习资源，提供互动课程、语法练习、词汇建设和音频材料。该网站提供从初级到中级的结构化课程，包含实用例子和文化见解。
best_quote_en: Learn Russian for free with our easy-to-follow lessons that include audio examples, exercises, and cultural notes to help you master the language effectively.
best_quote_zh: 通过我们易于遵循的课程免费学习俄语，课程包含音频示例、练习和文化注释，帮助您有效掌握语言。

title: Python Official Documentation
summary_en: Official documentation for the Python programming language, covering all aspects of the language from beginner to advanced topics.
summary_zh: Python 编程语言的官方文档，涵盖从入门到高级的所有语言特性。
best_quote_en: Python is an interpreted, object-oriented, high-level programming language with dynamic semantics.

title: MDN Web Docs
summary_en: Comprehensive resource for web developers, featuring documentation on HTML, CSS, JavaScript and more.
summary_zh: 为网页开发者提供的全面资源，包含 HTML、CSS、JavaScript 等技术的文档。
best_quote_en: MDN Web Docs is an open-source, collaborative project documenting Web platform technologies.

title: GitHub Guides
summary_en: Collection of guides to help you get started with GitHub and master Git workflows.
summary_zh: 帮助您开始使用 GitHub 并掌握 Git 工作流程的指南集合。
best_quote_en: GitHub is a code hosting platform for version control and collaboration.

title: Stack Overflow
summary_en: Largest online community for programmers to learn, share knowledge, and advance their careers.
summary_zh: 最大的程序员在线社区，用于学习、分享知识和推进职业发展。
best_quote_en: Stack Overflow is a question and answer site for professional and enthusiast programmers.

title: W3Schools Online Web Tutorials
summary_en: Web development tutorials covering all aspects of web programming with examples and exercises.
summary_zh: 涵盖网页编程所有方面的教程，包含示例和练习。
best_quote_en: W3Schools is optimized for learning, testing, and training.

title: CSS-Tricks
summary_en: Front-end development blog and resource hub focusing on CSS, HTML, JavaScript and web design.
summary_zh: 专注于 CSS、HTML、JavaScript 和网页设计的前端开发博客和资源中心。
best_quote_en: CSS-Tricks is a website about building websites and all that entails.

title: FreeCodeCamp Curriculum
summary_en: Free, self-paced coding curriculum covering web development, data science, and machine learning.
summary_zh: 免费的自定进度编码课程，涵盖网页开发、数据科学和机器学习。
best_quote_en: Learn to code for free and build projects for nonprofits.

title: Google Developers
summary_en: Resources and documentation for Google developer products and technologies.
summary_zh: Google 开发者产品和技术的资源和文档。
best_quote_en: Build anything with Google's platforms and tools.

title: Dev.to
summary_en: Community of software developers getting together to help one another out.
summary_zh: 软件开发者社区，大家聚在一起互相帮助。
best_quote_en: DEV Community is a place where coders share, stay up-to-date and grow their careers.

title: React Official Documentation
summary_en: Official documentation for React, a JavaScript library for building user interfaces.
summary_zh: React 的官方文档，这是一个用于构建用户界面的 JavaScript 库。
best_quote_en: React makes it painless to create interactive UIs.
